Installation

For all Users

We strongly recommend using a conda environment (learn mode here). To install and use our package follow the following sequence of commands.

$ conda create -n formosa_env python=3.7

$ conda activate formosa_env

$ pip install ForMoSA

$ pip install importlib-metadata==4.13.0

$ conda install xarray dask netCDF4 bottleneck

Issues?

If you run into any problem, please create an issue on GitHub.
